Reviews.Content: Dump! Not a good place at all. Lots of stairs which is a pain with luggage, lots of locked doorways that are also difficult to get through with luggage, no safety lock or deadbolt on door, dark hallways, one towel, phone booth shower, dirty slip covers on sofa. Stay elsewhere!
Reviews.Author: Fysty01

Reviews.Content: !! Terrible Hotel!! ACHTUNG !! I've been in this hotel 3 nights, and it was terrible. First, I've payed for a deluxe suite, and they give me a junior. The suite (which is described as a 60 m虏 suite) is, in fact, a 25 m虏 suite, very little. We asked for a deluxe suite (that's what we payed for!!) and M. ADVANI (the owner) said that he would give us free Pay TV if you stayed in the little suite... We didn't agree, and he INSULTS us (I can't say what he said to me...) !!! I never saw such a bad hotel. The people in this hotel are crazy, the rooms are very dirty (it stinked in the bed room). We found a hair on a towel ... well.. it's terrible ...Beware, if you ask for a 80 m虏 suite, they will give you a 30 m虏...
Reviews.Author: derek13
